verses.name: Deuteronomy 31:4
verses.text: And the Lord shall do unto them as he did to Sihon and to Og, kings of the Amorites, and unto the land of them, whom he destroyed.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 31:5
verses.text: And the Lord shall give them up before your face, that ye may do unto them according unto all the commandments which I have commanded you.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 31:6
verses.text: Be strong and of a good courage, fear not, nor be afraid of them: for the Lord thy God, he it is that doth go with thee; he will not fail thee, nor forsake thee.
